flavor_text_entries.red:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Lives lazily by
the sea. If the
SHELLDER on its tail comes off,
it becomes a
SLOWPOKE again.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
If the tail-biting
SHELLDER is thrown
off in a harsh battle, it reverts
to being an ordi­
nary SLOWPOKE.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Naturally dull to
begin with, it
lost its ability to feel pain due
to SHELLDER's
seeping poison.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
An attached
SHELLDER won't let
go because of the tasty flavor that
oozes out of its
tail.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
SLOWBRO’s tail has a SHELLDER firmly
attached with a bite. As a result, the
tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim
and catch prey instead.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
SLOWBRO’s tail has a SHELLDER firmly
attached with a bite. As a result, the
tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This causes SLOWBRO to grudgingly swim
and catch prey instead.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its tail has a SHELLDER firmly attached
with a bite. As a result, the tail can’t be
used for fishing anymore. This forces it
to reluctantly swim and catch prey.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
When a SLOWPOKE went hunting in the sea,
its tail was bitten by a SHELLDER. That
made it evolve into SLOWBRO.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
The SHELLDER that latches onto
SLOWPOKE’s tail is said to feed on the
host’s leftover scraps.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
SHELLDER on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
If the tail-biting SHELLDER is thrown
off in a harsh battle, it reverts to
being an ordinary SLOWPOKE.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Naturally dull to begin with, it
lost its ability to feel pain due
to SHELLDER’s seeping poison.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
Shellder on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
Shellder on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
Shellder on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Though usually dim witted, it
seems to become inspired if the
Shellder on its tail bites down.
flavor_text_entries.x:
An attached Shellder won’t let go because of
the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
flavor_text_entries.y:
When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail
was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve
into Slowbro.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Slowbro’s tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite.
As a result, the tail can’t be used for fishing anymore.
This causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch
prey instead.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Slowbro’s tail has a Shellder firmly attached with a bite.
As a result, the tail can’t be used for fishing anymore. This
causes Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
It spaces out while gazing at the sea.
With Shellder’s poison flowing through its body,
it becomes even spacier.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
Whenever Shellder bites down hard on its tail,
it gives Slowbro a flash of inspiration...which it
forgets a moment later.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Spacing out is basically all it does. It turns back
into Slowpoke if its tail, along with Shellder,
breaks off.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Shellder, in its greed to suck out more and more
sweetness from Slowbro’s tail, has
metamorphosed into a spiral-shaped shell.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Lives lazily by the sea. If the Shellder on its tail
comes off, it becomes a Slowpoke again.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Lives lazily by the sea. If the Shellder on its tail
comes off, it becomes a Slowpoke again.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit
on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail
make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokémon
into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go,
it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.
